name: curseforge
description: Non-official Javascript/Typescript bindings for the Curseforge API
author: Guillaume ARM <trapcodien@gmail.com>

scripts.build:docs: yarn run prettier && rimraf docs && typedoc --tsconfig tsconfig.json --out docs src/index.ts && prettier ./docs --write
scripts.build:all: yarn run build && yarn run build:docs
scripts.rebuild: yarn run clean && yarn run build
scripts.check: yarn run build:check && yarn run lint:all
scripts.recheck: yarn run clean && yarn run check
scripts.lint:all: yarn run lint && yarn run prettier:check
scripts.test:all: yarn run build:check && yarn run lint:all && yarn run test
scripts.retest:all: yarn run clean && yarn run test:all
scripts.preversion: yarn run clean && yarn run test:all
scripts.version: conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s -r 0 && git add CHANGELOG.md
